00024 #define BTMBFIXEDCONSTRAINT_DIM 6
00025 
00026 btMultiBodyFixedConstraint::btMultiBodyFixedConstraint(btMultiBody* body, int link, btRigidBody* bodyB, const btVector3& pivotInA, const btVector3& pivotInB, const btMatrix3x3& frameInA, const btMatrix3x3& frameInB)
00027         :btMultiBodyConstraint(body,0,link,-1,BTMBFIXEDCONSTRAINT_DIM,false),
00028         m_rigidBodyA(0),
00029         m_rigidBodyB(bodyB),
00030         m_pivotInA(pivotInA),
00031         m_pivotInB(pivotInB),
00032     m_frameInA(frameInA),
00033     m_frameInB(frameInB)
00034 {
00035     m_data.resize(BTMBFIXEDCONSTRAINT_DIM);//at least store the applied impulses
00036 }

00061 int btMultiBodyFixedConstraint::getIslandIdA() const
00062 {
00063         if (m_rigidBodyA)
00064                 return m_rigidBodyA->getIslandTag();
00065 
00066         if (m_bodyA)
00067         {
00068                 btMultiBodyLinkCollider* col = m_bodyA->getBaseCollider();
00069                 if (col)
00070                         return col->getIslandTag();
00071                 for (int i=0;i<m_bodyA->getNumLinks();i++)
00072                 {
00073                         if (m_bodyA->getLink(i).m_collider)
00074                                 return m_bodyA->getLink(i).m_collider->getIslandTag();
00075                 }
00076         }
00077         return -1;
00078 }
00079 
00080 int btMultiBodyFixedConstraint::getIslandIdB() const
00081 {
00082         if (m_rigidBodyB)
00083                 return m_rigidBodyB->getIslandTag();
00084         if (m_bodyB)
00085         {
00086                 btMultiBodyLinkCollider* col = m_bodyB->getBaseCollider();
00087                 if (col)
00088                         return col->getIslandTag();
00089 
00090                 for (int i=0;i<m_bodyB->getNumLinks();i++)
00091                 {
00092                         col = m_bodyB->getLink(i).m_collider;
00093                         if (col)
00094                                 return col->getIslandTag();
00095                 }
00096         }
00097         return -1;
00098 }

00100 void btMultiBodyFixedConstraint::createConstraintRows(btMultiBodyConstraintArray& constraintRows, btMultiBodyJacobianData& data, const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
00101 {
00102     int numDim = BTMBFIXEDCONSTRAINT_DIM;
00103     for (int i=0;i<numDim;i++)
00104         {
00105         btMultiBodySolverConstraint& constraintRow = constraintRows.expandNonInitializing();
00106         constraintRow.m_orgConstraint = this;
00107         constraintRow.m_orgDofIndex = i;
00108         constraintRow.m_relpos1CrossNormal.setValue(0,0,0);
00109         constraintRow.m_contactNormal1.setValue(0,0,0);
00110         constraintRow.m_relpos2CrossNormal.setValue(0,0,0);
00111         constraintRow.m_contactNormal2.setValue(0,0,0);
00112         constraintRow.m_angularComponentA.setValue(0,0,0);
00113         constraintRow.m_angularComponentB.setValue(0,0,0);
00114         
00115         constraintRow.m_solverBodyIdA = data.m_fixedBodyId;
00116         constraintRow.m_solverBodyIdB = data.m_fixedBodyId;
00117         
00118         // Convert local points back to world
00119         btVector3 pivotAworld = m_pivotInA;
00120         btMatrix3x3 frameAworld = m_frameInA;
00121         if (m_rigidBodyA)
00122         {
00123             
00124             constraintRow.m_solverBodyIdA = m_rigidBodyA->getCompanionId();
00125             pivotAworld = m_rigidBodyA->getCenterOfMassTransform()*m_pivotInA;
00126             frameAworld = frameAworld.transpose()*btMatrix3x3(m_rigidBodyA->getOrientation());
00127             
00128         } else
00129         {
00130             if (m_bodyA) {
00131                 pivotAworld = m_bodyA->localPosToWorld(m_linkA, m_pivotInA);
00132                 frameAworld = m_bodyA->localFrameToWorld(m_linkA, frameAworld);
00133             }
00134         }
00135         btVector3 pivotBworld = m_pivotInB;
00136         btMatrix3x3 frameBworld = m_frameInB;
00137         if (m_rigidBodyB)
00138         {
00139             constraintRow.m_solverBodyIdB = m_rigidBodyB->getCompanionId();
00140             pivotBworld = m_rigidBodyB->getCenterOfMassTransform()*m_pivotInB;
00141             frameBworld = frameBworld.transpose()*btMatrix3x3(m_rigidBodyB->getOrientation());
00142              
00143         } else
00144         {
00145             if (m_bodyB) {
00146                 pivotBworld = m_bodyB->localPosToWorld(m_linkB, m_pivotInB);
00147                 frameBworld = m_bodyB->localFrameToWorld(m_linkB, frameBworld);
00148             }
00149         }
00150         
00151         btMatrix3x3 relRot = frameAworld.inverse()*frameBworld;
00152         btVector3 angleDiff;
00153         btGeneric6DofSpring2Constraint::matrixToEulerXYZ(relRot,angleDiff);
00154         
00155         btVector3 constraintNormalLin(0,0,0);
00156         btVector3 constraintNormalAng(0,0,0);
00157         btScalar posError = 0.0;
00158         if (i < 3) {
00159             constraintNormalLin[i] = -1;
00160             posError = (pivotAworld-pivotBworld).dot(constraintNormalLin);
00161             fillMultiBodyConstraint(constraintRow, data, 0, 0, constraintNormalAng,
00162                                     constraintNormalLin, pivotAworld, pivotBworld,
00163                                     posError,
00164                                     infoGlobal,
00165                                     -m_maxAppliedImpulse, m_maxAppliedImpulse
00166                                     );
00167         }
00168         else { //i>=3
00169             constraintNormalAng = frameAworld.getColumn(i%3);
00170             posError = angleDiff[i%3];
00171             fillMultiBodyConstraint(constraintRow, data, 0, 0, constraintNormalAng,
00172                                     constraintNormalLin, pivotAworld, pivotBworld,
00173                                     posError,
00174                                     infoGlobal,
00175                                     -m_maxAppliedImpulse, m_maxAppliedImpulse, true
00176                                     );
00177         }
00178         }
00179 }
00180 
00181 void btMultiBodyFixedConstraint::debugDraw(class btIDebugDraw* drawer)
00182 {
00183         btTransform tr;
00184         tr.setIdentity();
00185 
00186         if (m_rigidBodyA)
00187         {
00188                 btVector3 pivot = m_rigidBodyA->getCenterOfMassTransform() * m_pivotInA;
00189                 tr.setOrigin(pivot);
00190                 drawer->drawTransform(tr, 0.1);
00191         }
00192         if (m_bodyA)
00193         {
00194                 btVector3 pivotAworld = m_bodyA->localPosToWorld(m_linkA, m_pivotInA);
00195                 tr.setOrigin(pivotAworld);
00196                 drawer->drawTransform(tr, 0.1);
00197         }
00198         if (m_rigidBodyB)
00199         {
00200                 // that ideally should draw the same frame
00201                 btVector3 pivot = m_rigidBodyB->getCenterOfMassTransform() * m_pivotInB;
00202                 tr.setOrigin(pivot);
00203                 drawer->drawTransform(tr, 0.1);
00204         }
00205         if (m_bodyB)
00206         {
00207                 btVector3 pivotBworld = m_bodyB->localPosToWorld(m_linkB, m_pivotInB);
00208                 tr.setOrigin(pivotBworld);
00209                 drawer->drawTransform(tr, 0.1);
00210         }
00211 }
